actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Unfavorable.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest held by the United States in certain lands in Pickens, Anderson and Oconee Counties, South Carolina, and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States in such lands.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release certain reversionary interests in specified lands conveyed to Clemson University, South Carolina. Conditions such release upon the use of the affected lands for public purposes. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to Clemson University certain Federal mineral interests in the lands to which the reversionary interests applied if the University's application meets specified guidelines.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest held by the United States in certain lands in Pickens, Anderson and Oconee Counties, South Carolina, and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States in such lands.
